00059           function  makeUid($uid){
00060               if(!strpos($uid,'@')){
00061                     return $uid.'@'.zimbraConfig::defaultEmailDomain;
00062               }
00063               return $uid;
00064           }
00072           function getAccountIdbyName($name){
00073                     $ret=$this->getAccountbyName($name);
00074                     return c($ret['id']);
00075           }

00084           function getAccountbyName($name){
00085                     $soap=array('GetAccountRequest','<account by="name">'.$name.'</account>');
00086           
00087                     $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00088                     $a=c($ret['soap:Body']['GetAccountResponse']['account']);
00089                     echo "-$a-";
00090                     return c($ret['soap:Body']['GetAccountResponse']['account']);
00091           }
